Ability: Spawns a Tier 2 defense tower at the target location that repairs friendly vehicles in a radius of 4 around it every 55 frames (3.7 in-game seconds) at a rate of 8 hit points every 2.25 frames over 8 frames (28.4 hit points over 0.53 in-game seconds)
The spawned tower loses 1 hit point every frame (0.07 in-game seconds)
Notes: Does not require power to operate
Does not keep the player in game ifShort Gameis enabled in skirmish and multiplayer
Cannot be repaired and is unaffected byForce Shield,InvulnerabilityandMaintenance
